website_summaries.verdict: This screen features concentric rings to keep it stable on a varied size of pans. And since it's made of perforated stainless steel, it won't burn like mesh screens.
pros: Perforated stainless steel screen with 13" diameter
Concentric rings help stabilize on smaller pans
Perforated steel won't clog or burn like mesh screens
Comfortable screen handle conveniently folds for nesting
cons: Concentric circle design can keep it from lying flat
Larger perforated holes let some spatter through

customer_reviews.title: OXO splatter screen is the best I've used so far

customer_reviews.title: While this tool is built very sturdy it does not do it's job well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a little over a month and use it a couple times a week. While this tool is built very sturdy it does not do it's job well. The holes in the stainless steal are larger than those in a wire mesh screen and do allow some oil to splatter our of the pan. When I purchased it I loved the idea of a quality, stainless steal splatter screen that would last a long time and work for whatever size pan I needed it for, however this doesn't do as efficient of a job as I'd like.

product_meta.title: OXO 1064468 Good Grips Stainless Steel Splatter Screen with Folding Handle,Silver
product_meta.description:
Keep your stove and countertops clean with the OXO Good Grips Splatter Screen. Made of perforated stainless steel, the Splatter Screen keeps grease contained when you fry bacon, sausages, potatoes and more. The Screen fits frying pans up to thirteen inches wide and features grooved rings to rest the Screen on different sized pans. The soft, comfortable handle locks securely in the open position and folds down for compact storage. Helpful hint: The Splatter Screen is also perfect for making crisp stove-top popcorn!
